title: Will we ever get a way to change the champion's voices to other languages?

body:
Earlier this year, with the file overhaul, alongside many custom skins, we lost the ability to use Voice Pack selectors.

Some people really like the voicing in league of legends, however, often, the best voice (or funniest) acting for a champion might have been for a different language.

For instance, the English Neeko voice appeals to me far less than the Japanese or Spanish ones, but choosing a different language in the client changes all the voices. Japanese Darius sounds terrible, as does Spanish Heimerdinger. 

I also miss French Rammus, he makes me feel so inexplicably uncomfortable. It was great.

I know it's alot of work for Riot to even consider letting us have this, but I miss it and I'm sure some of us miss it too.
